text: Gaurav Khanna (born 11 December 1981) is an Indian television actor. He is known for his roles of Neil in Jeevan Saathi, Inspector Kavin in CID, and Akshay in Tere Bin. He currently plays the role of Anuj Kapadia in Star Plus's Anupamaa, for which he won Indian Telly Award for Best Actor (Editorial). == References == == Other websites == * * Category:Indian television actors Category:Living people Category:Indian television presenters Category:1966 births Category:Indian models Category:Indian people Category:Actors from Uttar Pradesh
title: Gaurav Khanna
